Hardware description
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   :hidden:

   watchOverview

   NRF52832

   HRS3300


The P8 watch, manufactured by DaFit / Crrepa / Mofit consists of few hardware modules, these are:

* NRF52832 - the main uC
* I2C HeartRate-sensor hrs3300
* BMA421 accel-sensor
* touch sensor IC
* ST77XX display driver
* Vibration motor
